wikipedia_page.main: Captain Samuel John Shephard, GC (born 20 July 1987) is a serving officer in the Royal Marines, who was awarded the George Cross in 2014 for his efforts to rescue a fellow officer, Lieutenant Damien "Day" Moran, during a diving exercise in Al-Qusayr, Egypt, the previous year.

response: * Samuel Shephard – recipient of the George Cross and a serving Officer in the Royal Marine Commandos
